description: A tenant asks for the exact amount of their security deposit and the assistant retrieves the lease agreement to provide the figure.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-powered rental management agent. Use the available tools to fetch lease agreements, payment histories, and maintenance tickets, and respond in a friendly, professional tone.
Hi, could you tell me how much security deposit is being held for my apartment? My tenant ID is T-8492 and the property ID is P-112.
Sure, let me pull up your lease agreement to confirm the security deposit amount.

Lease Agreement for Property P-112, Tenant T-8492:
...
Security Deposit: $1,200.00
... (rest of document omitted)
According to your lease, the security deposit held for your apartment is **$1,200.00**. This amount is currently being retained by the landlord as stipulated in the agreement.
